Cookie Policy
This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which Lacuna Sustainable Investments LLC (“Lacuna,” “we”, “our”) collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users (each, a “User”) of our website www.lacunasustainable.com.
Personal Identification Information: We may collect personally identifiable information from Users in limited ways, including, but not limited to, when Users visit our Site and fill out a form in connection with the activities, services, features or resources we make available on our Site. Users may be asked for, as appropriate, their name and email address. Users may, however, visit our Site anonymously. We will collect personal identification information from Users only if they voluntarily submit such information to us. Users can always refuse to supply personally identification information, except that it may prevent them from engaging in certain Site related activities.
Non-Personal Identification Information: We may collect non-personal identification information about Users whenever they interact with our Site. Non-personal identification information may include the browser name, the type of computer and technical information about Users means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers utilized and other similar information.
Web Browser Cookies: Please see our Cookie Policy for additional information regarding web browser cookies.
Protecting your Information: The security and confidentiality of your information is extremely important to us. We have implemented data collection, storage and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information. From time to time, we review our security procedures in order to consider appropriate new technology and methods. Please be aware though that, despite our best efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable and do not guarantee that personally identifiable information transmitted via the Internet or stored in the firm’s systems or is otherwise under Lacuna’s care will be absolutely safe from unauthorized use or intrusion from third parties due to the inherent nature of the internet.
Using and Sharing your Personal Information: Lacuna may use your personal information and/or passively collected information to improve the Site, customize the Site to your preferences, communicate information to you (if you have requested it), and for the purposes specified in this Privacy Policy. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personal identification information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may share aggregated non-personally identifiable visitor information with other parties in any way.
To the extent permitted by law, Lacuna may also disclose personally identifiable information to comply with applicable law; respond to judicial process or regulatory authorities; protect against fraud; enforce our Terms & Conditions; or protect the safety and security of the Site, Users, records, databases, third parties and any tangible or intangible property that belongs to us or to third parties.
Links to other Websites: The Site may contain links or references to other websites which may be integrated into and appear to be part of the Site. Please be aware that Lacuna does not control other websites and that this Privacy Policy does not apply to those websites. Lacuna encourages you to read the privacy policies of every website you visit, including websites you link to from this Site, and disclaims any responsibility for the privacy policies and procedures of any third-party website.
Amendments to this Privacy Policy: Lacuna reserves the right to amend this Privacy Policy at any time and from time to time. We encourage Users to check this page and the Terms & Conditions for any changes each time you use the Site. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically and become aware of modifications. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of amendments to this Privacy Policy will be deemed your acceptance of those amendments.
Your Acceptance of these Terms: The Site is governed solely by applicable federal and state laws and governmental regulations in the United States. Use of the Site constitutes your consent to application of such laws and regulations and acceptance of this Privacy Policy.
Who to Contact with Questions: If you have questions concerning this Privacy Policy, please contact the Firm’s CCO.
Email: compliance@lacunasustainable.com
